text: What are your bad habits? I think everyone has bad habits. Not everyonewhatsoeverwheneverwhoevereveryoneagrees on what bad habits are. Some smokersthinkersdrinkerssmokingsmokersdon’t think smoking is a bad habit. Young people don’t think listening to loud music on the bedtraingroundrooftrainis a bad habit. In Japan, slurping your noodles is a sign that you enjoy your playtimefooddrinkfood, but making noise while eating inEnglandAsiaEuropeNorth PoleEnglandis not good. Have you ever tried to break your bad habits? I have quit smokingto smokesmokedsmokensmokingand have stopped leaving things laying around the anywherehousecoffee houseeverywherehouse I wish other people would stop their bad habits.
